title: The Escalating Israel-Palestine Conflict | J Balvin
itunes:title: The Escalating Israel-Palestine Conflict | J Balvin
description:
Trevor examines the violent escalation of the Israel-Palestine conflict, Michael Kosta talks to New Yorkers about their city's mayoral race, and reggaeton star J Balvin discusses "The Boy from Medellin."

Donate at http://www.dailyshow.com/TherapyAid to support the Therapy Aid Coalition's efforts in providing training and compensation to volunteer psychotherapists so people impacted by national crises can receive quality mental health care and support.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
